message.addProfiles: Add profiles to your account for a size recommendation.
message.missingMeasurements: Add more measurements to your profile for increased accuracy
message.noMeasurements: Add measurements to your profile for a size recommendation.
message.addThisMeasurement: Add this measurement to your profile to include it in the fit calculation.
message.noProfiles: You have no profiles on your account.
message.noTopButton: The shirt's top button for this size won't close.

sizeGuide.measurementDisclaimer: These measurements are measured <u>flat across the outside of the item</u>.
sizeGuide.measurementDisclaimerCollar: Except for the collar measurement, which is measured around the inside of the collar.
sizeGuide.measurementDisclaimerInside: These measurements are measured <u>inside the item</u>.
sizeGuide.advertisement: This size guide is brought to you by

fitInfo.stretchedLittle: The item is stretched a little.
fitInfo.stretchedMuch: The item is stretched a lot.
fitInfo.stretchedMax: The item is stretched to the max.
fitInfo.noOverlap: is directly on you with no overlap.
fitInfo.isSmaller: is <u>smaller</u> than your matching measurement by {{value}}{{whenPinched}}
fitInfo.armSleeveStraight: when your arm and the item's sleeve are <u>completely straight</u>

splash.detailedText:
Take a few measurements of yourself and get personalized info on how this item would fit you.
Create a free SizeMe profile and stop guessing!
splash.btnSignUpTitle: Yes, I'd like to create a free account
productPageSplashes: Unsure about the right size? Try
splash.productPageSplashTitle: SizeMe is a free service to help you know how this item will fit You

signupBox.message: Save your measurements, so you don't have to remember them ever again.
signupBox.duplicateUser: An account with this email already exists. Try to log in?

chest: Around your body under your arms at fullest part of chest
frontHeight: From where your neck meets your shoulder directly down to your waistband
sleeve: From your shoulder down to your wrist
Keep your arm straight and pointing down
pantWaist: Around your body from where you normally keep your pants
Pull your stomach in like you are fitting on a pair of tight pants
hips: Around your body at the widest part of your hips
outseam: The outside of your leg starting from the top of your waistband
Measure down to your ankle bone
shoeInsideLength: Place a measuring tape next to a wall and stand on the tape
calfWidth: Measure around widest part of calf
hatWidth: Measure the biggest circumference of head at just above top of ears

measurementGuide.title: How to measure your
measurementGuide.chest:
Measure around your body under your arms at fullest part of chest while wearing bra.

Breathe out fully while taking this measurement.
measurementGuide.frontHeight: Measure down from where your neck meets your shoulder directly down to your waistband (where you normally keep your pants).
measurementGuide.sleeve: Measure from your shoulder (where your shirt's seam usually is) down to your wrist (to the end of the radius bone to be exact). Keep your arm straight and pointing down while measuring.
measurementGuide.pantWaist:
Measure around your body from where you normally keep your pants, about 6 cm down from belly-button height.

Pull your stomach in like you are fitting on a pair of tight pants.
measurementGuide.outseam: Measure the outside of your leg starting from the top of your waistband (where you normally keep your pants) and measure down to your ankle bone (lateral malleolus to be exact).
measurementGuide.shoeInsideLength: Place a measuring tape next to a wall and stand on the tape.
measurementGuide.calfWidth: Measure around widest part of calf.
measurementGuide.hatWidth: Measure the biggest circumference of head at just above top of ears.
